          <title>
            <string language="it">Il Danubio</string>
            <string language="en">The Danube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Donau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Danube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Danúbio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Δούναβης</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questa risorsa è dedicata al Danubio. Si tratta di una raccolta di esercizi interattivi.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO is all about the river Danube. It's a mixed type of an interactive exercise</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Il Danubio</string>
            <string language="en">the Danube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">fiumi</string>
            <string language="en">rivers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">inondazioni.</string>
            <string language="en">river flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE ist ganz über den Fluß Donau. 
Es ist ein Mischtyp interaktive Übung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BAS est tout au sujet du fleuve Danube. 
C'est un type mélangé d'un exercice interactif</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este BAIXO é toda sobre o rio Danúbio. É 
um tipo misturado de um exercício interativo</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO είναι όλο για τον ποταμό Δούναβης. 
Είναι ένας μικτός τύπος μιας διαλογικής άσκησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este BAJO está todo sobre el río Danubio. Es 
un tipo mezclado de un ejercicio interactivo</string>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Questa risorsa può essere utilizzata per scoprire i fiumi europei. Si tratta di un quiz interattivo con diverse modalità di domanda; si va dalle risposte chiuse da scegliere tra quelle presenti in una lista predefinita, alle risposte aperte. Sono richieste alcune conoscenze di base sul fiume.</string>
            <string language="en">You can use this LO after learning about the rivers of Europe. It's an interactive quiz with different types of questions from just selecting an answer from the list to writing it in full. It demands some knowledge about the river.</string>
          </description>
